quotes.quote: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Truth will ultimately prevail where there is pains to bring it to light.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Guard against the impostures of pretended patriotism.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: I hope I shall possess firmness and virtue enough to maintain what I consider the most enviable of all titles, the character of an honest man.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Worry is the interest paid by those who borrow trouble.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Happiness and moral duty are inseparably connected.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Let your Discourse with Men of Business be Short and Comprehensive.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Experience teaches us that it is much easier to prevent an enemy from posting themselves than it is to dislodge them after they have got possession.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: The strongest man in the world is he who stands most alone.
quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.quote: The spectacles of experience; through them you will see clearly a second time.
quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.quote: Home life ceases to be free and beautiful as soon as it is founded on borrowing and debt.
quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.quote: The man whom God wills to slay in the struggle of life - he first individualizes.
quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.quote: A forest bird never wants a cage.
quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.quote: The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: If a building looks better under construction than it does when finished, then it's a failure.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: You can't get mad at weather because weather's not about you. Apply that lesson to most other aspects of life.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Sometimes it feels as if everything in life is just something we haul into the grave.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: High school is such a shared experience in North American culture.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: I love working out how things are made, which is why I have so many models of towers.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: My father has never once asked me a question, any question. There's a freedom that came from that. It allowed me to create my own way of thinking.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Patriotism is supporting your country all the time, and your government when it deserves it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If people like you, they'll listen to you, but if they trust you, they'll do business with you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A brand for a company is like a reputation for a person. You earn reputation by trying to do hard things well.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: Life's too short to hang out with people who aren't resourceful.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: If you do build a great experience, customers tell each other about that. Word of mouth is very powerful.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: If you're competitor-focused, you have to wait until there is a competitor doing something. Being customer-focused allows you to be more pioneering.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of companies, those that work to try to charge more and those that work to charge less. We will be the second.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: If you're trying to create a company, it's like baking a cake. You have to have all the ingredients in the right proportion.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: I do love email. Wherever possible I try to communicate asynchronously. I'm really good at email.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: If you learn from defeat, you haven't really lost.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: If you think back to the beginning of cell phones, laptops or really any new technology, it's always expensive.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: Everything has its wonders, even darkness and silence, and I learn, whatever state I may be in, therein to be content.
quotes.author: Helen Keller
